note.p: Education: Westminster School; Clare College, Cambridge; BA (1735); Corpus Christi College, Cambridge; MA (1739)

Career: Ordained deacon and priest (1739); Prebendary of Rochester (1740-1773); Rector of Wimpole, Cambridgeshire (1742-1745); probably Rector of Lee, Kent (1745-1773); Vicar of Boughton Monchelsea (1747-1755); Vicar of Aylesford (1754-1773); Registrar to the Archbishop of Canterbury (1754)
Notes: Withdrew 1767. BR gives death date as 20 August 1773, Venn gives 28 August 1773
